front.div:
Acknowledgements
This Information Paper is the first IEA study focusing exclusively on rural electrification policies in
major emerging economies. Its aim is to provide keys to successful rural electrification policies. Its
conclusions and recommendations are based on an analysis of the rural electrification programmes
of Brazil, China, India and South Africa.
The International Energy Agency and the author wish to thank Antonio Pflüger, former Head of the
IEA Energy Technology and Collaboration Division for suggesting the theme of this paper, for finding
funding, and for all the very useful comments and ideas he provided during the initial phase.
